relatedBlades.title: Protect teams with Zero Trust Browsing
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare's Browser Isolation service makes web browsing safer and faster for your business, and it works with native browsers.
relatedBlades.copy:
Web browsers are more complex and sophisticated than ever before. They're also one of your biggest attack surfaces. 

Cloudflare Browser Isolation is a Zero Trust browsing service. It runs in the cloud away from your networks and endpoints, insulating devices from attacks.

subMenuItems.linkText: Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE), 2024
Forrester Wave™ for Security Service Edge Solutions, Q1 2024
Forrester Wave™ for Zero Trust Platforms, Q3 2023
IDC MarketScape for Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA), 2023
KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE Integration Suites, 2023
Forrester Opportunity Shapshot: Leverage Zero Trust To Combat Multichannel Phishing Threats

relatedBlades.copy:
Applying Zero Trust to browsing means that no code or interactions should be trusted to run on devices by default.

Cloudflare Browser Isolation runs all code at our edge — insulating users from untrusted web content and protecting data in browser interactions from untrusted users and devices.
relatedBlades.title: Secure users, devices, and data with Zero Trust browsing
relatedBlades.subtitle: Key benefits

features.title: SWG policies are too restrictive, or too relaxed
features.description: No [secure web gateway](https://www.cloudflare.com/teams/gateway/ "Cloudflare Gateway") can possibly block every threat on the Internet. In an attempt to limit risks, IT teams block too many websites, and employees feel overly restricted.

features.title: Malicious content is difficult to spot and costly to remediate
features.description: Innocuous webmail attachments, plugins, and software extensions can disguise harmful code. Once that code travels from a user's browser to their device, it can compromise sensitive data and infect other network devices.

features.title: IT teams have limited power to manage browser activity
features.description: Organizations often do not have full visibility into or control over the browsers their teams use, keeping them from meeting compliance standards and securing the users, devices, and data on their network.

relatedBlades.title: Attacks will strike. Mitigate the impact.
relatedBlades.copy: Browser Isolation executes all browser code in the cloud, instead of on the endpoint. When users inevitably run into Internet threats, Zero Trust browsing stops malware from infecting their devices and causing chaos in your network.

relatedBlades.title: Not your average remote browser.
relatedBlades.copy: [Legacy remote browsers](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/access-management/what-is-browser-isolation/ "What is Browser Isolation?") send a slow and unresponsive version of a web page to the user. Cloudflare draws an exact replica of the page on the user's device, and then delivers that replica so quickly it feels like a regular browser.

relatedBlades.title: Ready to get started? Add Browser Isolation to any paid Zero Trust plan.

marketoForm.bladeName: Zero Trust Ent Plan - Contact us
marketoForm.marketoFormLeadSourceDetail: [ACQ] Q3'20 WEB - Zero Trust Contact Us - Ent Plan

buttonModal.title: Request a Zero Trust discussion
buttonModal.regularCopy: Fill out the form below, and an expert from our team will get in touch to schedule a customized discussion of your Zero Trust journey and how Cloudflare may be able to help.

relatedBlades.title: Verify. Filter. Inspect. Isolate.
relatedBlades.copy: With [Cloudflare Zero Trust](https://www.cloudflare.com/teams "Cloudflare Zero Trust"), administrators set Zero Trust browsing rules in the same place they design Zero Trust application access policies. Filtering, inspection and isolation rules are applied in one lightning-fast single pass inspection architecture, with minimal latency.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a laptop in front of a cloud

relatedBlades.quote: "We started using Cloudflare Zero Trust Services with Browser Isolation to help provide the best security for our customers' data and protect employees from malware. It worked so well I forgot it was on."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Phishing is the fastest growing attack vector against DroneDeploy, and we're targeted daily. Remote Browser provides an invisible protective layer to prevent entire classes of exploits and data exfiltration, with zero impact to business productivity."

features.title: Product Brief: Cloudflare Browser Isolation
features.description: Summarizes threat and data protection benefits of Cloudflare Browser Isolation.

features.title: Whitepaper: Common browser isolation challenges, and how to overcome them
features.description: Learn the most common challenges associated with traditional browser isolation approaches, and how Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform helps overcome them.

features.title: Demo: Try Cloudflare Browser Isolation
features.description: Demo lightning-fast, secure browsing at the edge. No subscription, no installation, and no pixel pushing.

features.title: Solution Brief: Email Link Isolation
features.description: Isolate email links and apply 'never trust, always verify' scrutiny to reduce attack surface and simplify operations. Soon, Cloudflare Area 1 customers will be able to turn on Cloudflare Browser Isolation to neutralize sophisticated multi-channel phishing threats.

features.title: Playbook Blog: Decommissioning your VDI
features.description: This blog offers Cloudflare's perspective on how remote browser isolation can help organizations offload internal web application use cases currently secured by virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI).

features.title: Webinar: Extend Zero Trust threat and data protection
features.description: In this on-demand webinar, Cloudflare will share how to integrate browser isolation into your threat and data protection strategy -- with no tradeoffs in experience for end users. You will also hear from Jonathan Lister Parsons, CTO and co-founder of PensionBee, who will share perspectives on evolving his organization's IT and security strategy and the role browser isolation plays in that journey.

relatedBlades.title: Start now
relatedBlades.copy: Browser Isolation is now natively integrated in the Cloudflare Zero Trust policy builder, allowing administrators to allow, block, or isolate any security or content category and application group. Integrates with groups from your identity provider for user and team-based isolation policies. Organizatins of any size can sign up now.
